root: ^Good day, sir, I am Detective Redd Rhum, and I wanted to know what you found out so far.
^Detective, it’s such a waste of a beautiful, healthy body isn’t it?

s: ^Focus. Tell me what happened to the body.
^Are you suggesting that she died from something else, something internal?

A: ^There was blunt force trauma to the back of the head. The damage to the back of her head, however, wasn’t enough to indicate that was the cause of death. She has no other visible injuries, I've thoroughly checked.
C: ^Perhaps, although I have no clue what that would be and it’s not my job to figure that out now is it detective? Good luck, the funeral will begin soon. Her husband, Jack, wanted to get the funeral over with as quickly as possible.
